tool.name: PCA and Scores Test
tool.description: Variables used by all/many SimStitch functions
tool.command: #set $tool_directory = $getVar('__tool_directory__', '../../../../tools/Statistics') #if str($executable.value) == "true" #if $components.option=="auto" sh $tool_directory/run_PCAScoresTest.sh /usr/local/MATLAB/MATLAB_Compiler_Runtime/v81 '${pls_dso}' '${classlist}' '${output_l}' '${output_s}' '${output_v}' '${output_results}' 0 #else sh $tool_directory/run_PCAScoresTest.sh /usr/local/MATLAB/MATLAB_Compiler_Runtime/v81 '${pls_dso}' '${classlist}' '${output_l}' '${output_s}' '${output_v}' '${output_results}' $components.numcomps #end if #else #if $components.option=="auto" matlab -logfile ${output_log} -nosplash -r "cd('$tool_directory'); PCAScoresTest('${pls_dso}', '${classlist}', '${output_l}','${output_s}','${output_v}', '${output_results}', 0); exit;" #else matlab -logfile ${output_log} -nosplash -r "cd('$tool_directory'); PCAScoresTest('${pls_dso}', '${classlist}', '${output_l}','${output_s}','${output_v}', '${output_results}', $components.numcomps); exit;" #end if #end if

param.name: classlist
param.label: Name of the classlist to use for Scores Test procedure (t-test or ANOVA). If name does not match, error will be returned in message file.

param.name: option
param.label: Automatically select number of components for model?

param.name: numcomps
param.label: Select number of components for PCA model. If number is larger than max number of components then all components will be used.

data.name: output_results
data.label: PCA and Scores Test on $pls_dso.hid: results

data.name: output_l
data.label: PCA and Scores Test on $pls_dso.hid: loadings (.csv)

data.name: output_s
data.label: PCA and Scores Test on $pls_dso.hid: scores (.csv)

data.name: output_v
data.label: PCA and Scores Test on $pls_dso.hid: eigenvalues (.csv)

data.name: output_log
data.label: PCA and Scores Test on $pls_dso.hid: log
